English: Azar

Korean:
아자르는 어떠한 상황이라도 당황하지 않고 능숙하게 대처하여 조사단의 많은 기대를 받고 있으며 따르는 자도 많습니다.

환영검 스킬로 인해 적을 여러번 공격할 수 있으며, 환영검을 활용하여 다양한 스킬 연계가 가능한 공격 역할군입니다.
English:
Azar is always composed and reacts skillfully to any situation which makes him a great leader. The Investigation Team expects nothing less of him.

He is an Attacker who can combo his skills in various ways by repeatedly attacking enemies with his Illusion Swords.
Japanese:
アザールはどんな時でも慌てることなく適切に対処するため、調査団内でも多くの信頼を受けています。

 幻影の刃で攻撃を繰り返し、様々なスキルの連携で敵を翻弄します。
Chinese:
阿扎尔拥有冷静的头脑和稳健的作战能力，能够熟练应对战场中的各种局势变化，也因此备受调查团的器重，拥有众多追随者。

 通过幻影剑多次攻击敌人，灵活运用幻影剑可连续触发多种技能，是团队中的进攻型角色。
Chinese-TW [zh-tw]:
阿札爾擁有冷靜的頭腦和穩健的作戰能力，能夠熟練應對戰場中的各種局勢變化，也因此備受調查團的器重，擁有眾多追隨者。

 透過幻影劍多次攻擊敵人，靈活運用幻影劍可連續觸發多種技能，是團隊中的進攻角色。

English: After playing a skill, draw if hand is empty, prioritizing the caster.
Illusion Swords

Korean: 난 언제나 준비되어 있어. 말만 해.
English: I'm always ready. Just say the word.
Japanese: いつでも大丈夫だ。合図してくれるだけでいい。
Chinese: 需要我就说一声，我随时都可以出发。
Chinese-TW [zh-tw]: 需要我就說一聲，我隨時都可以出發。

English:
All skills in hand gain Illusion Sword buff at the start of next turn if the user takes no damage.
If Azar is fainted, the buff will not be applied.
Veiled Sword

Healing Power -50%.
At turn end, gain +10% Attack Power for each Illusion Sword and Illusion Sword Buff in hand.
Total: +&a%.
Cast all Illusion Swords in hand on all enemies. Illusion Swords critical hit if targeting one enemy.
Discard all Illusion Swords in hand.
Sword of Infinity
When this skill is discarded, gain Barrier equal to 50% of Healing Power.
Illusion Sword

Korean: 이 스킬의 위 아래에 있는 스킬에 환영검 버프를 부여합니다.
English:
When this skill is drawn, gain an Illusion Sword buff.
When this skill is discarded, create an Illusion Sword in hand.
Gain 2 Mana if this skill does not have Illusion Sword buff.
Japanese: このスキルの上と下にあるスキルに幻影の刃効果を与える。
Chinese: 给位于此技能的上方及下方的技能赋予幻影剑增益。
Chinese-TW [zh-tw]: 給位於此技能的上方及下方的技能賦予幻影劍增益。

English: Illusion Sword: First Scroll

Next turn, start with 1 less Mana.
This skill gains cost equal to current Mana. Create 2 Illusion Swords in hand per cost gained. Cost is reduced if hand would become full.
Total: &a cost gained. &b Illusion Swords will be created.
Ascending Slice

Apply Illusion Sword buff to another skill in hand.
This skill casts again if it has an Illusion Sword buff.
Blade Starfall
Discard the lowest cost skill in hand. Draw a skill and apply Illusion Sword buff. If the cost of the discarded skill was 0, gain 1 Mana. If it had an Illusion Sword buff, gain 1 Mana.
Illusion Flash
When this skill is drawn, apply Illusion Sword buff to another skill in hand.
Veiled Sword

Korean: 비용이 0인 스킬을 낼 때마다 비용이 감소합니다.
English:
Cost reduced at the start and end of each turn.
Attack Power +25% and cost reduced whenever a 0-cost skill is added to hand.
Total: &a skills added.
Japanese: コスト0のスキルを使用する度、コストが減少する。
Chinese: 每次释放费用为0的技能时，此技能的费用减少1点。
Chinese-TW [zh-tw]: 每次釋放費用為0的技能時，此技能的費用減少1點。

English: Storming Blade

Remove Illusion Sword buff from all skills in hand. For each buff removed, gain 1 Mana.
Select a skill to apply Illusion Sword.
0-cost skills in hand gain Illusion Sword buffs up to current Mana.
Fantasy

Apply Illusion Sword buff to the top skill without Illusion Sword buff in hand.
Gain 1 Mana if none.
Sword of Infinity

Korean: 이 스킬에 환영검 버프가 있으면, 두 번 시전합니다.
English: This skill casts again for each Illusion Sword and Illusion Sword buff in hand.
Japanese: このスキルに幻影の刃効果がある場合、もう一度発動する。
Chinese: 当此技能附带幻影剑增益时，释放两次。
Chinese-TW [zh-tw]: 當此技能附帶幻影劍增益時，釋放兩次。

English: Crescent Slash
Select a skill to discard. If the cost of the discarded skill was 2 or less, draw 2 skills. Skills in hand gain Illusion Sword buffs equal to the cost of the discarded skill.
Shining Aura

Discard all Illusion Swords in hand. Create Illusion Swords in hand equal to the amount of discarded skills. If none were discarded, spend 1 mana, draw a skill, and add 'Sword of Infinity' to your hand. Otherwise, create an Illusion Sword in hand.
Dancing Sword

Choose one -
Create an Illusion Sword in hand and apply Illusion Sword buff.
Create an Illusion Sword in hand for each Illusion Sword in hand.
Illusion Sword's Calling
Create an Illusion Sword in hand and apply Illusion Sword buff.
Illusion Sword's Calling
Create an Illusion Sword in hand for each Illusion Sword in hand.
Apply Illusion Sword

Korean:
스킬을 2개 뽑고, 뽑은 스킬에 환영검 버프를 부여합니다.
아자르가 전투 불능 상태라면, 환영검 버프를 부여하지 않습니다.
English:
Draw 2 skills and apply Illusion Sword buff onto them.
If Azar is fainted, the buff will not be applied.
Japanese:
スキルを2個引き、幻影の刃効果を与える。
アザールが戦闘不能である場合、幻影の刃効果を与えない。
Chinese:
抽取2个技能，并给抽取的技能添加幻影剑增益。
若阿扎尔处于无法战斗的状态，则不添加幻影剑增益。
Chinese-TW [zh-tw]:
抽取2個技能，並為抽取的技能加入幻影劍增益。
若阿札爾處​​於無法戰鬥的狀態，則不加入幻影劍增益。

English: Fractured Illusion
Add an Illusion Sword to hand if you play or discard this skill.
Illusion Sword
